name: Lava Escape
description:
For a long time I wanted to make some cool games, but I don't really know how. This game was an exploration of what I can do with the limited scope of my skills.

In this game, you are a small, blue square person, who has to avoid the lava which is slowly rising from the ground. To avoid the lava, you have to jump, wall-jump and weave your way around giant black platforms that surround you.

If you have any problems, or want to make a suggestion for the game, then feel free to leave a comment.
